Articles.Content:
Wow.... use your mouse to move the view... cockpits from famous planes.... pick one, click on it and have fun....

http://vr.museumofflight.org/

 

Here is my favourite.... B29 tail
 

http://vr.museumofflight.org/b29_tail

Works with Vive (and I'm assuming Oculus) via Virtual Desktop. Open up the cockpit you want in a window, not quite full screen size. Set cardboard mode at the bottom left. Then enable SBS direct in VD (F10).
Nice find thanks for sharing, I love those photos of the inside positions of a B-17.   I got to walk through one once, but not long enough to appreciate all the little details.

This looks cool!

I have a friend with a VR headset, so I'll try it out sometime.
